name: CyberCity (aadamhuda)
description:
CyberCity is a turn based strategy game set in a cyberpunk setting. You progress through two levels, the cargo level and city level, defeating enemies in strategic turn-based combat and picking up clues on your way that progress the story of our four characters: Nadiya, Dreyar, Astra and Joe. Collect all the clues in the two levels to complete the game, and explore the narrative of CyberCity! This project was done for the Multi-Platform Games Development Module (ECS657U) at QMUL. Our game took inspiration from Persona 5 and many other turn-based strategy games. For a few of us in this group, it was our first time developing a game.

Creators:

  • Aadam Huda
  • Sarah Brahimi
  • Ibraheem Samih
  • Gentian Veliu
  • Hina Matsuzaki

Any Feedback is great :). All creators GitHub links are located in the Git Repository README. All assets used are credited within the games README file located here.
